hint: Focus on safe improvements: push filters early, convert implicit joins to explicit JOINs, isolate selective date dimension.
Materialize filtered dimension subsets (date, demographics, address) into CTEs before joining with fact table, maintaining explicit joins.
Pre-filter and materialize ALL dimension tables AND fact table subsets in separate CTEs, then join, optimizing for multi-branch filter patterns.
Transform complex OR conditions into UNION ALL branches, deduplicate fact table scans, and apply dimension prefetch per branch.
